title: BOI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 400 Apprentice Posts
description: Bank of India (BOI) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the 400 vacancies for Apprentice Positions. Those candidates who have qualified for Any Degree can use this chance and apply for the BOI Recruitment 2025 . Here we mentioned more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online on ot before the last date of application. For more detai...
